name: James Pond 2: Codename RoboCod
overview: Evil 'Dr Maybe' is scheming to destroy every game factory in the World by planting his deadly penguin bombs. You must dive to the rescue as 'Robocod' - licensed to Gill! 'Finning off' speeding bullets, scaling walls of danger and 'fiercely filleting' killer caterpillars in 8 'cod-smacking' levels!
